alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 04 at 3:30AM MDT until April 06 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT MDT TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 75 mph. * WHERE...Sawatch Mountains and Mosquito Mountains above 11000 feet * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to midnight MDT Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy wind driven snow will cause drifting and low visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft
